attributes.action: Every child has the right to get free Early years education
attributes.additional_details: End the discriminatory income level, every child has the right to start early years support from 2 year old. This is an institutional discrimination.
attributes.background: Not every parent earns more than £100,000, some parents earn just above the thresholds or lower income. Sometime not having childcare make parents to stay on benefits. Those families earn between 20k to 40k their kids loose out from early years education.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend entitlements to free childcare for 2-year-olds to all working families: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317697

Provide 5 days a week free childcare for ages 0-4 for all working parents: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550625
